title: 'Amazing': Trump hosts Salvadoran president amid deportation fury
shortDescription: The Trump administration has deported hundreds of Venezuelans to El Salvador under the 1798 Alien Enemies Act.

title: Trump insists there are no tariff exceptions: 'Nobody off the hook'
shortDescription: Uncertainty over tariffs has placed a pall over financial markets and fueled concerns of inflation and a possible recession.

title: Trump official who oversaw dismantling of USAID leaves State Department
shortDescription: Sources told Reuters that Marocco, who was the director of foreign assistance at the State Department, may have been pushed out.

title: Tariffs 'unfolding exactly like we thought it would': Trump adviser
shortDescription: Trade adviser Peter Navarro said carve-outs for smartphones and other tech products weren't really exclusions from sky-high tariffs on Chinese imports.

title: Deportations, layoffs: Is the Supreme Court friend or foe to Trump 2.0?
shortDescription: In recent decisions, conservatives on the Supreme Court overturned or trimmed lower court rulings against the Trump administration.

title: Teen killed parents as part of plot to assassinate Trump, FBI says
shortDescription: Authorities believe Nikita Casap's parents were fatally shot more than two weeks before the gruesome discovery of their bodies.

title: Trump's 'frequent victories' at golf show he's healthy, doctor says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump scored good marks on his annual physical, thanks in part to golf excursions, according to his White House doctor.

title: No 'instant results' in Trump Ukraine talks, Kremlin warns
shortDescription: "Thereâ€™s a point at which you just have to either put up or shut up," President Trump said of discussions to end the Ukraine war.

title: When will Trump impose smartphone tariffs?
shortDescription: "This is not a permanent sort of exemption," Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said of Trump's tariff carve-outs for tech products.

title: Trump team pushes migrant gang claims - sometimes without proof
shortDescription: Attorney General Pam Bondi alleged a Salvadoran man was a top U.S. leader of the MS-13 street gang - then DOJ moved to drop criminal charges.

title: Could Trump transform D.C.'s African American history museum?
shortDescription: President Trump targets museums he said push divisive ideology. Activists and historians say he's trying to erase the nation's tarnished history.

title: Trump administration says Abrego Garcia 'alive and secure' in prison
shortDescription: A federal judge mandated that US officials submit daily reports on Kilmar Abrego Garcia and steps to return him after they mistakenly deported him.

title: Trump admin invalidates social security numbers of over 6,000 immigrants
shortDescription: The Social Security Administration listed more than 6,000 living immigrants as dead in a move directed by the Trump White House and DOGE.

title: President Trump exempts smartphones, computers, chips from new tariffs
shortDescription: The Trump administration late Friday exempted smartphones, computers and other electronic imports from President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs.

title: Trump appointee Dr. Oz says Medicaid won't pay for gender-affirming care
shortDescription: CMS leader Dr. Mehmet Oz said Medicaid won't pay for gender reassignment operations or hormone treatments for minors.

title: Man charged for posting YouTube threats to kill Trump, ICE agents
shortDescription: Federal prosecutors said that Shawn Monper used the YouTube account "Mr Satan" to post comments on several videos, threatening officials.

title: Trump says he took cognitive test during annual physical
shortDescription: Trump said the results of his annual physical exam will be released Sunday. He said he took a cognitive test and "got every answer right."

title: Trump gives military control of federal land at southern border
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued a memorandum Friday giving the U.S. military jurisdiction over federal lands at the southern border.

title: Exclusive: Trump budget proposal would eliminate Head Start funding
shortDescription: The White House's budget proposes eliminating Head Start, an early childhood education program that provides services to low-income families.

title: 19 state AGs ask judge to block Trump student-visa revocations
shortDescription: The Trump administration argues some international students have improperly participated in pro-Palestinian protests.
